info.name: FB Offline Conversions API (oCAPI) - [do not use|depracated]

response.name: [200] Ok - Business Manager's id and name.

request.description:
**Offline Conversions API**:

[https://developers.facebook.com/docs/marketing-api/offline-conversions](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/marketing-api/offline-conversions)

**Offline Conversion Data Set**:

[https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/offline-conversion-data-set/](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/offline-conversion-data-set/)

**Access Token Debugger**

[https://developers.facebook.com/tools/debug/accesstoken/](https://developers.facebook.com/tools/debug/accesstoken/)

response.name: [403] Forbidden - missing ads_management scope.

header.value: OAuth "Facebook Platform" "insufficient_scope" "(#294) Managing advertisements requires an access token with the extended permission for ads_management"

response.name: [400] Bad Request - missing permission on the asset (Offline event sets).

header.value: OAuth "Facebook Platform" "invalid_request" "Unsupported get request. Object with ID '446900580466057' does not exist, cannot be loaded due to missing permissions, or does not support this operation. Please read the Graph API documentation at https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api"

response.name: [200] OK - information retrieved.

item.name: 2) Upload Offline Events [do not use | deprecated]

request.description:
**Offline Conversions API**:

[https://developers.facebook.com/docs/marketing-api/offline-conversions](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/marketing-api/offline-conversions)

**Upload Events:**

You should upload transaction **within 62 days** of the conversion.

Ref.: [https://developers.facebook.com/docs/marketing-api/offline-conversions#upload-events](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/marketing-api/offline-conversions#upload-events)

You can generate a test lead here:

[https://developers.facebook.com/tools/lead-ads-testing](https://developers.facebook.com/tools/lead-ads-testing)

response.name: [400] - Bad Request no event was sent

header.value: OAuth "Facebook Platform" "invalid_request" "(#100) param data must be non-empty."

response.name: [400] - Bad Request PII not hashed.
[400] - Bad Request data is not sent as per documentation (missing double quotes)

header.value: OAuth "Facebook Platform" "invalid_request" "(#100) The parameter data is required"

request.description:
**Offline Conversions API**:

[https://developers.facebook.com/docs/marketing-api/offline-conversions](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/marketing-api/offline-conversions)

### View Upload Stats

A Business Manager admin or system user who created the offline event set can retrieve upload stats. Also any admin on the¬†`ad_account`¬†which is connected to the offline event set can read this data.

item.name: 3) View Upload Stats in a period

request.description:
**Offline Conversions API**:

[https://developers.facebook.com/docs/marketing-api/offline-conversions](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/marketing-api/offline-conversions)

View daily breakdowns of offline events in¬†`Offline Events Manager`¬†in Business Manager. For more precise breakdowns, make this call.

Ref.: [https://developers.facebook.com/docs/marketing-api/offline-conversions#event-upload-stats](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/marketing-api/offline-conversions#event-upload-stats)
